channel.title: Help me compile
channel.description: i cant compile anything i cant compile corntrollers this is the error i get when i try 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . . but i moved it to the folder that had javac and this is the error that i get when i try and compile The system cannot find the path specified. javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . . (sry for not putting in the correct format didnt no how

item.title: Help me compile
item.dc:creator: @afferin afferin
item.description:
@afferin wrote:

Right click,
Edit,
Deleate everything inside,
Add this:

@echo off COLOR 04 title Alonescape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java" server pause

Read full topic
